text: I'm such a dull fellow, really. Dull? She couldn't believe it. Self-deprecation was not one of Nigel's usual attributes. You need your holiday, darling. I only wish I would make me more interesting, I suppose? she enquired archly.
handwritten_text: I'm such a dull fellow, really. Dull? She couldn't believe it. Self-deprecation was not one of Nigel's usual attributes. You need your holiday, darling. I only wish I would make me more interesting, I suppose? she enquired archly.
